rows.label: tlk41200122_06_msg0001
rows.name:
If Acedia collapsed, what happened
to all the Armu there?!

rows.label: tlk41200122_06_msg0002
rows.name:
Were they just left to die?!
Oh... how could they...

rows.label: tlk41200122_06_msg0003
rows.name:
Oh, there weren't any?
I guess ranching isn't very common in Acedia.

rows.label: tlk41200122_06_msg0004
rows.name:
But if refugees are coming here, that
might mean our Armu will be
killed for food!

rows.label: tlk41200122_06_msg0005
rows.name:
What should I do?! What should I do?!
Should I take the Armu and hide in the forest
with them?!

rows.label: tlk41200122_06_msg0007
rows.name:
Aaaaaahhh!!
Armu aren't delicious, you know!!
